DOC.brief_summary: This study show evaluation correlation muscle strength level functional autonomy elderly woman .
DOC.brief_title: Muscle Strength Functional Autonomy Elderly Women
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study evaluate correlation muscle strength level functional autonomy elderly woman impair muscle-skeletal system depend normal IGF-1 level . The target-population compose elderly woman age 60 75 year ( age : 67.79 ± 5.11 year , BMI : 28.01 ± 5.4 ) , resident asylum , IGF-1 level within normal value age ( normo-IGF-1 ) . Evaluations muscle strength ( 1-RM test ) functional autonomy ( GDLAM Protocol ) performance activity daily live ( ADL ) , measurement basal serum level IGF-1 ( Chemiluminescence method ) perform .
DOC.criteria: present muscleskeletal dysfunction , osteoporosis , arthritis , tendinitis , able perform ADL without help others ; practice physical activity least 12 month ; provide normal IGF1 level age ; elderly woman unfit perform strength functional autonomy test medical assessment ;
